summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Pharma-Alert role persistence and routing fixes. All required features tested successfully including role selection, authentication flows, and dashboard component structure.
passed_tests: Signup page shows role selection with Patient/Pharmacist buttons
Role buttons have correct data-testids (role-patient-btn, role-pharmacist-btn)
Pharmacist signup form includes pharmacy name field
Signin page loads with email/password form
Pharmacist dashboard redirects to signin when unauthenticated
Patient dashboard redirects to signin when unauthenticated
PharmacistDashboard component has all required data-testids (pharmacist-dashboard, status-card, pharmacy-card, connections-card, on-duty-toggle)
No Emergent badge or analytics present
Proper routing and authentication protection implemented
